籤詩版本二:
Iyo icing pakike inowedzera mavara, uye rombo rakanaka rinounza rombo rakanaka uye rombo rakanaka.
Vanhu venguva iyoyo havafanirwe kuzvidemba kuti vakave nemukurumbira pakupera kwehupenyu uye vakave nemukurumbira pasi rese mune imwe yakawira pasi.
詩意:
Iyi hexagram ndiyo icing pakiki.
Rombo rakanaka mune zvese.
解曰: Chekare chinova chitsva. Ngarava kune zvakapedzwa zvinhu. Saka hupenyu hwake vavariro. Zvinhu zvose zvinofarirwa.
籤詩故事一:
◇Liang Haodengke
Nyanzvi, Liang Hao (963-1004), zita rekuremekedza Taisu, akaberekerwa muXucheng, Yunzhou (yava kunzi Dongping, Shandong) muRwiyo Rwenziyo.
Munguva yekutonga kwaYongxi, akapasa bvunzo yeJinshi aine makore gumi nemasere. Kuramba ndichinyorera bvunzo kwakakundikana.
Akatanga kunyora bvunzo mugore rechitatu reTianfu, akapasa bvunzo gore rega rega kuburikidza neKuzotevera Han Dynasty neLater Zhou Dynasty, asi akakundikana gore rega rega. Akapika kuti aisazoyananiswa kana akasahwina mubairo wekutanga.
Pazera remakore makumi masere nemaviri, mugore rechipiri rekutonga kwaYongxi kwaMambo Zhenzong weSong Dynasty, akahwina mubairo wekutanga.
聖意: Namatira kuchengetedzeka pamba (zvine shungu), kuchengetedzeka kwako, kuwana mari, kutengeserana, muchato, Liujia varume vanofamba netsoka, Chitian silkworms, mapoinzi masere, mhuka nhanhatu, kutsvaga vanhu, mhosva dzeveruzhinji, kutama, pfuma yakarasika, zvirwere zvekuchamhembe kwakadziva kumadokero, Fushan guva bhenefiti.
